biotools.summary: MSIGen is an open-source Python tool for processing and visualizing mass spectrometry imaging (MSI) data, supporting various formats and vendors. It offers both a graphical interface and command-line access, efficiently generating ion images and performing signal processing, suitable for MS1, MS2, and IMS-MSI data analysis.
